arts.ttl: Van Dijk 'angry' after 1st red card with Dutch
arts.sum: Virgil van Dijk said he was "angry" with the decision to give him the first of two yellow cards as he was sent off for the first time in his Netherlands career in Friday's 1-1 Nations League draw with Hungary.

arts.ttl: Netherlands Player Ratings in draw against Hungary
arts.sum: Netherlands drew 1-1 against Hungary in the Nations League on Friday evening. Below is our player ratings for the Oranje stars. Bart Verbruggen 6/10: Didn’t have much to do all night and couldn’t stop the goal. Denzel Dumfries 7/10: Again came to the rescue with a goal to earn a point. Also created a great […] The post Netherlands Player Ratings in draw against Hungary appeared first on Football Oranje.

arts.ttl: Virgil van Dijk sent off to leave Netherlands boss fuming over 'broken agreement'
arts.sum: Hungary and Netherlands played out a goalless draw as Virgil van Dijk was sent off in a game with Liverpool stars involved including Dominik Szoboszlai, Ryan Gravenberch and Cody Gakpo

arts.ttl: Van Dijk sent off as Dutch rescue draw in Hungary
arts.sum: Denzel Dumfries headed a late equaliser for the Netherlands to rescue a point in a 1-1 draw with Hungary in their Nations League A Group 3 clash in Budapest on Friday, where the visitors finished with 10 men after captain Virgil van Dijk was sent off.

arts.ttl: Virgil van Dijk shares whether he plans to return to Liverpool right away after Netherlands red card on Friday night
arts.sum: Liverpool captain Virgil van Dijk didn’t have the best of nights for the Netherlands on Friday. The Reds and Oranje skipper was sent off during...

arts.ttl: Van Dijk sent off as Netherlands draw in Hungary
arts.sum: Virgil van Dijk saw red as The Netherlands were held to a 1-1 draw by Hungary. Ronald Koeman decided to hand Quinten Timber his first start for Oranje, while Micky van de Ven was left-back and Joshua Zirkzee began up front. After a minutes silence for Johan Neeskens, the Netherlands began with a lot of […] The post Van Dijk sent off as Netherlands draw in Hungary appeared first on Football Oranje.

Football-Oranje’s Michael, Mike and Abdul react to the Nations League tie between the Netherlands and Hungary. Join in the conversation on YouTube! To watch or listen to our live stream reaction, click here, or press play below: The post Post-Match Reaction | Hungary 1-1 Netherlands | Podcast appeared first on Football Oranje.

arts.ttl: Undav scores twice for Germany in Nations League and Hungary holds Dutch to draw
arts.sum: Denis Undav scored a brace and the four-time World Cup winners extended their unbeaten record in the Nations League to three matches with a convincing 2-1 win at Bosnia-Herzegovina on Friday. His Stuttgart clubmate Maximilian Mittelstädt was the provider six minutes later with an excellent cross, and Undav doubled Germany’s lead with a clean tap-in from close range.

arts.ttl: Hungary 1-1 Netherlands: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Virgil van Dijk sees red in draw
arts.sum: Netherlands survive a late red card for Virgil van Dijk to secure a point in a 1-1 draw with Hungary in the UEFA Nations League.

arts.ttl: Ronald Koeman sparks fresh Frenkie de Jong injury worries after Barcelona return
arts.sum: Netherlands manager Ronald Koeman has admitted Frenkie de Jong was'scared' about his return to action after spending close to six months on the sidelines with an ankle injury. Koeman, however, left De Jong out of his international squad to give the midfielder as much time as possible to focus on his condition after spending so long out on the sidelines.
